select * from (select s.teacher_id as teacherId, s.user_id as id, su.nick_name as name, su.sex as sex, su.phonenumber as phone, su.email as email, sd.dept_name as deptName, sr.role_key from teacher s inner join sys_user su on s.user_id = su.user_id inner join sys_dept sd on sd.dept_id = su.dept_id inner join sys_user_role sur on s.user_id = sur.user_id inner join sys_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.role_id) t where t.role_key = #{roleKey}
and t.teacherId=#{teacherId}
